amendment.description: Amendment includes crimes of violence involving the environment in the definition of crimes of violence to which enhanced penalties will attach.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add to the definitions of violent crimes specified in the bill, crimes of violence involving the environment.

action.text: Mr. McCollum raised a point of order against the Conyers amendment (A006). Mr. McCollumn stated that the provisions of the amendment were beyond the scope of the bill and were, therefore, not germane. Point of order overruled by the Chair.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
